creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: 6 panel screen with alternating panels of calligraphy, and panels of bamboo stalks with delicate foliage and small inscriptions
markings: Japanese mark in white chalk (?) back of L panel ULC; seals on each panel; sticker URC with Japanese inscription in red
object_name: Six-panel folding screen, one of a pair
title: Bamboo and Chinese Poems [right of a pair]
